thread.section_title: Stock Market & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Zara’s Blues: What’s Keeping World’s Most Valuable Fashion Retailer Down

author: Stephen Wilmot
title: Zara’s Blues: What’s Keeping World’s Most Valuable Fashion Retailer Down
text:
Zara-owner Inditex has emerged as a rare winner in the retail industry’s shift to e-commerce, making it by far the world’s most valuable fashion retailer. But there is a flip side to its success that investors ignore at their peril.
Most chains design items based on high-fashion runway templates, send the blueprints to Asia for low-cost production, then market them to consumers through well-located stores. But now online sales are cannibalizing store sales, while social media bring consumers closer to fashion trends, meaning...
